Adventurers' Guide:
I know you've got the particulars down, but I like to review sometimes.
Hunt Chimera Pieces, Soldiers of Ancient Times, Mutated Creations, Warriors of Ancient Times, Shamans of Ancient Times, Creatures of the Past, Forgotten Ancient People, Forgotten Faces and Giant's Shadows. Collect 50 Relic Boxes and take them to Recipe Merchant Dolphren.
